alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Fayette County through 645 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hazleton, or near Oelwein, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oelwein around 630 PM CDT. Maynard around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include County Road W 33 And 187, County Roads 3 And W 13, Westgate and County Roads 3 And W 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
